name: storageify
author: Daniel Lopes <lopsch@googlemail.com>
description: Store/read Cycle.js state (from Cycle.js onionify) in/from HTML5 Local Storage

scripts.test-dev-min: export NODE_ENV=test && export REPORTER=min && node -r babel-register scripts/test/test.dev.js
scripts.test-ci: export NODE_ENV=test && export BABEL_ENV=ci && node -r babel-register scripts/test/test.ci.js
scripts.dist-ci-min: export NODE_ENV=production && export BABEL_ENV=min && node -r babel-register scripts/build/build.ci.js
scripts.lint-dist: yarn run lint && yarn run dist-ci
scripts.ci: yarn run lint && yarn run test-ci && yarn run coverage && yarn run dist-ci-min && yarn run doc && yarn run lib
scripts.format: node -r babel-register scripts/prettier/prettier.format.js && node -r babel-register scripts/linting/linting.fix.js
